name: Styrlitz 3: Agent USSR
summary:
Styrlitz 3 is a comedic point-and-click adventure game. It is a parody of the popular Soviet television series Seventeen Moments of Spring about the exploits of a Soviet spy operating in Nazi Germany under the name Max Otto von Stierlitz. This is the third game in the series.

In this entry in the series, Styrlitz investigated a mysterious crash in space involving the soviet spacecraft with the first woman in space and a UFO.
